# Currency Converter

This is a simple currency convert for the Python 3 shell. Practicing using input, if else statements, and math floats.
The currencies are:
- USD ($) at the rate of $1.20
- EUR (€) at the rate of €1.14
- JPY (¥) at the rate of ¥159.39


## Tech used

It was created using Python 3.
